channel.title: war on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in war on Rusland 1

item.title: Tucker Carlson and Vladimir Putin
item.description: Rurik About a quarter of the more than two-hour interview was devoted to answering the first question, or rather, to Putin’s opening monologue. It began in 862 with Prince Rurik; from there, returning to the present was quite the journey.

item.title: Wolves in the Shooting Range (Волки в тире)
item.description: War Title track from the album (YouTube, Bandcamp, Spotify) released in 2023. Featuring девять песен о войне, nine songs about war, с ее похоронами в финале, with its funeral in the finale (Meduza 2023). Video clip by Какой-то либерал, 2023 Lyrics, lyrics with translation

item.title: OPERATION WAR
item.description: Speech Putin gave a speech (see also here and here) and, one assumes, believed in a quick victory. It turned into a disaster for everyone, and over two years later, the likelihood of terrible escalation seems more realistic than that of a quick end.
